lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods said he will play in the May 7-10 tournament in Ponte Vedra Beach, Fla., in addition to the Memorial in Ohio.

headline.print_headline: Woods Beefs Up His Tournament Schedule
headline.main: Tiger Woods to Participate in the Players Championship

snippet: Tiger Woods said he will play in the May 7-10 tournament in Ponte Vedra Beach, Fla., in addition to the Memorial in Ohio.
abstract: Tiger Woods will participate in Players Championship golf tournament in Ponte Vedra Beach, Fla; other golf news noted.
